item.description:
Hi everyone,

I know this is way last-minute, but I'd like to squeeze in one more outdoor meet-up before Thanksgiving.

We'll be meeting at East Park (also known as Cristoforo Columbo Park) which is located on Shrewsbury Street in Worcester, next to Anthony's Restaurant. Parking is available on the street directly in front of the park. We'll be meeting at the tennis courts. Dress warmly!

Hopefully, we will be able to let the pups run free. I will be bringing water for the dogs, but please feel free to bring your own as well as any "materials" for cleaning up after your doggie.

For directions:

http://www.mapquest.c...

Cancellation procedure: If the weather isn't cooperating, I'll send a cancellation notice by email, and I'll also post the cancellation on the meetup website 2 hours before the meetup time.

I hope to see many of you there!

- Kathleen

group.name: The Worcester English Bulldog Meetup Group

item.name: November Bulldog Meetup
